front.title: Extending the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Reason Header for Applications

abstract.t: This document defines a new protocol value "Application" for the Reason Header field and a new IANA Registry for registering application types. This new value enables signaling that a request or response has been issued as a result of a decision made by a particular type of application or that an initial request has been retargeted as a result of an application decision.
